original_text: But know this, that if the master of the house had known at what hour the thief was coming, he would not have left his house to be broken into.
korean_text: 너희도 아는 바니 집 주인이 만일 도둑이 어느 때에 이를 줄 알았더라면 그 집을 뚫지 못하게 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: that if the master of the house had known
at what hour the thief was coming,
he would not have left his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 집을 맡기지 않았을 것입니다
